title: can't share my screen in a meeting
body:
While on a meeting when clicking the share button it open the menu for sharing
but when clicking on Screen / Window nothing happen

![image](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/99732661/4c20e935-24d1-455c-b8f5-fa934806c9ab)

is this known issue? is there any walk around?
